name: Deep Focus
description:
Listen to your favourite playlist.
- Preloaded with 'Deep Focus' playlist.
- Load any youtube playlist by list id

---

Usage:
1. Go to any public playlist on Youtube.
2. You should see a url like: "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFMTDS4p0b5hSxRVlab3wwbZwKTjUxa2L", copy that.
3. Run the plugin.
4. Paste and click on 'load'.
